subject: Placed order using phone number
description_text:
Good Afternoon,
I placed an order earlier today and checked out as a guest using my phone number rather than an email.  I never received a confirmation text.  I am not sure if my order was received.  My phone number is +17179928203.

Sincerely,
John
Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi John Spyker,  Please provide the payment amount and the order date, and we will help you check the order status.Â
